definition: the left-radical form of Kangxi radical 145, 衣[yi1]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
for the first time/first (meeting, attempt etc)
first day of lunar month/New Year's Day/first year in junior middle school
third year in junior middle school
2nd year in junior middle school/2nd day of a lunar month/2nd day of lunar New Year

sentences.english: The type of surgery is the first to be conducted on an infant.
sentences.chinese: 这是首次在初生婴儿身上进行的同类型手术。

sentences.english: Xiangyin Jianzi is a local rhyme dictionary of the Changsha dialect in the early 20th Century.
sentences.chinese: 《湘音检字》是一部反映20世纪初长沙方言的韵书。

sentences.english: It may look like a severe sunburn, later becoming reddish Brown, rough, and scaly.
sentences.chinese: 初看似严重的晒斑，后呈红褐色，粗糙并有鳞屑。

sentences.english: The picking time for spring teas in China is usually from March to early May.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，春茶的采摘时间通常是每年的三月至五月初。

sentences.english: The Rockets were a popular choice to make the Western Conference finals when the season began.
sentences.chinese: 赛季初的时候，火箭是众望所归的西部决赛球队。

sentences.english: At first glance, it seems like the sort of story that falls in with the rest of the modern genre.
sentences.chinese: 初看来，这部书似乎与当代流派的其他作品类似。

sentences.english: Studies the initial boundary value problem of a new nonlinear evolution equation.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类非线性方程的初边值问题。

sentences.english: I financed his initial research and helped him out when times were tough.
sentences.chinese: 我赞助他早初的研究并在困难时刻帮助他。

sentences.english: Ming Fei and Hu children married early, felt two hundred cars were Orchid.
sentences.chinese: 明妃初嫁与胡儿，毡车百两皆胡姬。

sentences.english: The article content is divided into three parts:Part one, the rise of the constitutionalism group at the beginning of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，20世纪初立宪派的兴起。

sentences.english: The result shows that the adhesive has advantages of higher initial tack and enduring tack.
sentences.chinese: 该胶具有较高的初粘性和持粘性。

sentences.english: At first, it looked as if Otzi had frozen to death in a snowstorm in the Alps.
sentences.chinese: 初看起来奥兹似乎冻死于阿尔卑斯山的雪暴。

sentences.english: Sana is a authoress of Daur who began her writing in early 1990's.
sentences.chinese: 萨娜是于九十年代初走上文坛的达斡尔族当代女作家。

sentences.english: You are to give them the firstfruits of your grain, new wine and oil, and the first wool from the shearing of your sheep
sentences.chinese: 初收的五谷，新酒和油，并初剪的羊毛，也要给他。

sentences.english: Last year the number of sunspots dropped to a level not seen since the beginning of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 去年太阳黑子的数目降至自20世纪初的最低点。

sentences.english: An early morning in early April, sunbeams drop on the ground like ice blades.
sentences.chinese: 四月初，早上的阳光好像冰刀，一条一条掉到地上。

definition: tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man
middle (of a period of time)/medium-term (plan, forecast etc)
within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
